name: Linia
content:
Linia was a Human woman, who lived on the planet of Dalicron-4 during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Linia was the daughter of Daz, a man who operated Daz's Tavern, in Dalia on Dalicron-4. She worked in the tavern and, by the time of the Galactic Civil War, was in her early 20s. When a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents visited the tavern in 3 ABY, Linia served them.
Linia was an outgoing Human female.
